 | "       Released....: Dec 17, 2013      Protection.: Money        /   /   7
 `.________________________________________________________________.' _.' _.' .

 .----------------------------- r e l e a s e info --------------------------+
 |                                                                           '
 -  The kingdom of Tarethiel has been taken over by creatures of hell.  Your '
 '  mission  is  to  cleanse  the  kingdom  and  free  the  citizen from the
    agonizing wrath of the demon child called Damien. Grab  your  axe,  bow,
 `  gun  or  magic  powers  and  start  purging  the  Gate Keepers and their
 `  minions!
 `
 .  Hero Siege is a gore filled  Hack N Slash  game  with  heavy  Rogue-like
 :  elements.  Choose a class and start your survival journey. Find secrets,
 |  obtain items, slay hordes of different enemies and bosses.
 |
 |  Features :
 |
 |  Ã¢â€¢â€˜ Randomly  generated  levels,  items,  dungeons,  bosses,  secrets  and
 |    events. Every game session you play is different!
 |  Ã¢â€¢â€˜ Over  100  unique  crafted  items  that  are either passive, usable or
 |    orbiting.
 |  Ã¢â€¢â€˜ Over  40  different  enemies  with the possibility to spawn as rare or
 |    elite with extra hp/damage and abilities, but dropping better loot and
 |    giving more exp!
 |  Ã¢â€¢â€˜ Over 50 Achievements to unlock!
 |  Ã¢â€¢â€˜ Many different perks to unlock!
 |  Ã¢â€¢â€˜ Customize your character!
 |  Ã¢â€¢â€˜ 3  Acts  which  all  consist  of  5 zones + lots of randomly generated
 |    dungeons!
 |  Ã¢â€¢â€˜ 3+ unlockable classes!
 |  Ã¢â€¢â€˜ 3 different difficulty levels to unlock!
 |  Ã¢â€¢â€˜ Tons  of  random!  Start  discovering  all  the  wonderful secrets and
 |    content!                                                               .
 |                                                                           :
 |  More info : http://www.panicartstudios.com/index.php                     |
 |                                                                           |
 `._______....::::::::::.___________________________________________________.'

.'   .----------`-------'------ r e l e a s e notes -------------------------.
i   i                                                                        '
|   |  1# Unzip, Unrar manually.                                             '
|   |  2# Run setup.bat, after thats done hit Hero Siege.exe to play.
|   |  3# Have phun!
|   |
|   |  Ripped: Nothing.
|   |
|   |  Notes: Developers mention about the game might not work on Windows XP
|   |         and Windows Vista, anyways we tested the game in different PCs
|   |         with different versions of Windows XP and Vista and it works!.
|   |
|   |  REMEMBER :                                                            .
|   |  If you like this game, buy it. Developers deserve your support!!      :
